targets.rawSql:
select
  timestamp as time,
  name,
  rate / 1e18
from
  curve_pool_rate
where
  address = '0xbebc44782c7db0a1a60cb6fe97d0b483032ff1c7'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and timestamp > '2021-02-01'
order by
  time asc

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  dai / 1000000000000000000 as dai,
  usdc / 1000000000000000000 as usdc,
  usdt / 1000000000000000000 as usdt
FROM ousd_vault
  where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  total_supply / 1e18 as total_supply,
  rebasing_supply / 1e18 as rebasing_supply,
  non_rebasing_supply / 1e18 as non_rebasing_supply
FROM o_token
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and chain_id = 1 and otoken = '0x2a8e1e676ec238d8a992307b495b45b3feaa5e86'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  apy7_day_avg,
  apy14_day_avg,
  apy30_day_avg,
  apy
FROM o_token_apy
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and chain_id = 1 and otoken = '0x2a8e1e676ec238d8a992307b495b45b3feaa5e86'
ORDER BY 1
select timestamp as time, apy, apy7_day_avg, apy14_day_avg, apy30_day_avg from o_token_apy where chain_id = 1 and otoken = '0x2a8e1e676ec238d8a992307b495b45b3feaa5e86' order by id desc limit 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  yield_usd / 1e18 as yield
FROM o_token_rebase
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and chain_id = 1 and otoken = '0x2a8e1e676ec238d8a992307b495b45b3feaa5e86'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  fee_usd / 1e18 as fee
FROM o_token_rebase
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") and chain_id = 1 and otoken = '0x2a8e1e676ec238d8a992307b495b45b3feaa5e86'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
timestamp as time, 
case asset 
  when '0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f' then 'DAI' 
  when '0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7' then 'USDT' 
  when '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' then 'USDC' 
end as asset, 
balance / case asset 
  when '0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f' then 1e18 
  when '0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7' then 1e6 
  when '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' then 1e6 
end as balance
FROM strategy_balance where strategy = '0x89eb88fedc50fc77ae8a18aad1ca0ac27f777a90'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
order by time

SELECT 
timestamp as time, 
case asset 
  when '0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f' then 'DAI' 
  when '0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7' then 'USDT' 
  when '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' then 'USDC' 
end as asset, 
balance / case asset 
  when '0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f' then 1e18 
  when '0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7' then 1e6 
  when '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' then 1e6 
end as balance
FROM strategy_balance where strategy = '0x76bf500b6305dc4ea851384d3d5502f1c7a0ed44'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
order by timestamp, asset desc
